page.title: 13A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: ON A SCHOOL DAY I GET UP JUST AFTER 8.OAM. I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND EAT BREAKFAST. MY FAVOURITE CEREAL IS SHREDDIES. I DON'T HAVE A DRINK OR TOAST BUT I MIGHT HAVE CRISPS OR FRUIT. THEN I DRESS. I OFTEN FORGET TO CLEAN MY TEETH AND WASH. I NEVER MAKE MY BED. NEXT I WATCH T.V.AM THEN ABOUT 8.5OAM I WALK TO SCHOOL. AT SCHOOL WE HAVE LESSONS PLUS THREE BREAKS, MORNING,LUNCH AND AFTERNOON. WE GO HOME AT 3.3OPM I WATCH T.V. OR CALL FOR MY FRIEND. I HAVE NO HOMEWORK. AT 5.OO OR 6.OOPM WE HAVE TEA. FISHFINGERS, CHIPS AND PEAS ARE MY FAVOURITES. AFTER TEA I'M ALLOWED OUT TILL ABOUT 8.3OPM THEN I WASH AND HAVE SOME SUPPER, PERHAPS CRACKERS AND PATE AND MILK. I WATCH T.V. THEN I GO TO BED AT ABOUT 9.30.THERE IS A BUSY RAIL WAY LINE RUNNING THROUGH THE VILLAGE TAKING COAL TO WILLINGTON POWER STN.
